name: MyLight
description:
"MyLight" is a touching story of a small being trapped in the prison of darkness. Suddenly a little firefly appears out of nowhere and guides both of them to the freedom, however in order to escape they need to beat some of the toughest traps and puzzles. Will they make it to the end?

With this project I'd like to encourage players to look into the deep meaning of the story and try to see yourselves in its characters.

While playing please keep in mind that this is my first game :)
